name: Minos Station: Escape Room
description:
This game is about solving puzzles while you face different challenges during the game, you will see that each puzzle gets more complicated little by little.

Keep in mind that there is no time limit, the only way to solve the puzzles is by paying close attention.
I hope you enjoy the game as it was created by me minos to give you great satisfaction while playing this cool game.

There are different variations of puzzles, I hope you can solve all of them, you will also come across other obstacles, remember to pay attention, and be as detailed as possible.

If you're playing this time, I know you're already enjoying it.


Regards, minos, creator of Escape Rooms.
